DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to find out whether a single fecal microbiota transplantation is an effective and safe treatment as an adjunct to standard therapy in patients with ulcerative colitis.
DOC.brief_title: Fecal Microbiota Transplantation in Patients With Ulcerative Colitis
DOC.criteria: active ulcerative colitis (PUCAI 1064) in whom fecal microbiota transplantation via colonoscope can be performed severe ulcerative colitis (PUCAI > 65)
